Coding & Development.pricing: Free with 150K daily tokens; paid tier at $20/month for higher limits.

Coding & Development.name: Botpress
Coding & Development.description: A developer-focused platform for building serious bots and AI agents. It provides a visual builder and various options for data management and integrations.
Coding & Development.pricing: Free for up to 1,000 monthly active users, with custom pricing for enterprise plans.

Coding & Development.name: Cline
Coding & Development.description: A VS Code extension for AI-powered coding with a focus on custom model integration. It supports various LLM providers and local models, and features a Memory Bank system and MCP integration.
Coding & Development.pricing: Free extension; pay for API usage.

Coding & Development.name: Clueso
Coding & Development.description: Clueso is an AI-powered platform that transforms raw screen recordings into professional product videos and documentation. It automates editing, adds voiceovers, captions, and branding.
Coding & Development.pricing: Free plan available. Paid plans start from $29/month for the Starter plan.

Coding & Development.name: Fronty
Coding & Development.description: Converts images and designs into HTML and CSS code.

Coding & Development.name: Gecko Security
Coding & Development.description: An AI that finds and fixes security vulnerabilities in your code by testing it like a hacker. It's found several 0-day's in open-source projects.

Coding & Development.name: HeyOz
Coding & Development.description: An all-in-one AI ad creator that generates image and video ads. It can create various content formats, including AI UGC, talking head videos, and static ads.

Coding & Development.name: Hive
Coding & Development.description: A project management tool that uses AI to automate tasks, generate content, and provide insights into project data.

Coding & Development.name: Lavender
Coding & Development.description: Real-time email assistant that analyzes emails and provides suggestions to improve tone, clarity, and length.

Coding & Development.name: openrouter
Coding & Development.description: OpenRouter provides a unified interface to access over 300 AI models from various providers through a single API.

Coding & Development.name: Rapider AI
Coding & Development.description: Enterprise-grade low-code platform with subscription-based development services. Build complex applications with minimal coding and get expert help when needed.

Coding & Development.name: Roo
Coding & Development.description: A VS Code extension for AI-powered coding, similar to Cline.

Coding & Development.name: Wem
Coding & Development.description: AI enhanced enterprise applications and intelligent core systems, automate enterprise-wide workflows and integrations using no-code driven AI at incredible speed.

Coding & Development.name: Windsurf
Coding & Development.description: A standalone IDE for research-driven development, featuring advanced web search, code completion, and support for multiple powerful LLMs.
Coding & Development.pricing: Free with a base model; $15/month for credit-based access to more powerful models.

Coding & Development.name: ZeroTrusted AI
Coding & Development.description: Robust LLM Firewall solutions, ensuring your data and identity are protected in the AI space.

Coding & Development.name: Adobe Firefly
Coding & Development.description: A suite of generative AI-powered features for creating image, audio, and video content. It allows users to generate and edit content using simple text prompts.

Coding & Development.name: Alteryx
Coding & Development.description: No-code AI studio to create analytics apps with natural language querying.

Coding & Development.name: Clari
Coding & Development.description: Revenue platform that uses AI to provide end-to-end visibility into the revenue process and deliver accurate forecasts.

Coding & Development.name: Cody
Coding & Development.description: An AI coding assistant from Sourcegraph that can answer questions about your codebase.

Coding & Development.name: Cursor
Coding & Development.description: AI-powered IDE built on VS Code with intelligent code assistance

Coding & Development.name: GitHub Copilot
Coding & Development.description: An AI pair programmer tool by GitHub and OpenAI that provides real-time code suggestions and interactive chat capabilities. It's deeply integrated with the GitHub ecosystem and supports multiple development environments.
Coding & Development.pricing: Free tier available; paid tiers start at $10/month.

Coding & Development.name: JetBrains AI Assistant
Coding & Development.description: An AI assistant deeply integrated with JetBrains IDEs. It provides code completion, chat, documentation generation, and more, with a focus on data privacy and support for various LLMs.
Coding & Development.pricing: 7-day trial; paid tier from $10/month, requires IDE subscription.

Coding & Development.name: Replit Agent
Coding & Development.description: Replit Agent is an AI that can build and deploy software collaboratively from natural language prompts.
Coding & Development.pricing: Replit Core plan at $20/month includes Agent access.

Coding & Development.name: Retool
Coding & Development.description: A low-code developer-centric platform designed to expedite the creation of custom internal applications.
Coding & Development.pricing: Free edition available, Team: $12/month per standard user + $7/month per end user, Business: $65/month per standard user + $18/month per end user, Enterprise: Custom pricing

Coding & Development.name: Snyk
Coding & Development.description: The AI Security Platform for developers. Snyk delivers trusted, actionable insights and automated remediation, enabling modern organizations to innovate without limits and secure AI-driven software.

Coding & Development.name: Xcode AI Assistant
Coding & Development.description: An AI coding assistant integrated into Xcode 16 for Apple ecosystem development. It's privacy-focused, operates offline, and is optimized for Swift/SwiftUI.
Coding & Development.pricing: Free with Xcode 16+ on Apple Silicon.

Knowledge Management.name: Mem
Knowledge Management.description: AI-powered note-taking app that organizes and resurfaces notes automatically.

Knowledge Management.name: Readable
Knowledge Management.description: AI-generated documentation that simplifies complex technical concepts.

Knowledge Management.name: Saner.ai
Knowledge Management.description: An alternative to Mem for AI note-taking.

Knowledge Management.name: Guru
Knowledge Management.description: Knowledge management platform with in-context AI answers

Knowledge Management.name: Notion
Knowledge Management.description: A knowledge management and note-taking tool with AI features for summarizing content, generating ideas, and more.
Knowledge Management.pricing: Freemium, with paid plans starting from $8/user/month.

Knowledge Management.name: Notion Q&A
Knowledge Management.description: AI-powered search across company knowledge base and Slack

Business & Sales.name: AirOps
Business & Sales.description: Content operations engine for scalable SEO content creation

Business & Sales.name: Attio
Business & Sales.description: Modern AI-powered CRM for SMEs and startups

Business & Sales.name: Jeeva AI
Business & Sales.description: Superhuman sales, powered by Agentic AI.

Business & Sales.name: Markopolo AI
Business & Sales.description: Reach 30–40% more customers with personal outreach at scale.

Business & Sales.name: Rilla
Business & Sales.description: Conversation intelligence for outside sales that records, transcribes, and analyzes in-person customer meetings.

Business & Sales.name: AdCreative
Business & Sales.description: AI ad creative generation for Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads

Business & Sales.name: Cognism
Business & Sales.description: Provides premium, globally compliant B2B sales intelligence with phone-verified mobile numbers.

Business & Sales.name: Gong.io
Business & Sales.description: Revenue intelligence platform that records, transcribes, and analyzes sales conversations to provide insights.

Business & Sales.name: HubSpot AI Email Writer
Business & Sales.description: AI email assistant with CRM integration for campaigns

Business & Sales.name: HubSpot Sales Hub
Business & Sales.description: All-in-one platform with AI assistants for email, call summaries, reports, and predictive lead scoring.

Business & Sales.name: lemlist
Business & Sales.description: Cold outreach tool that helps you get replies.

Business & Sales.name: LinkedIn Sales Navigator
Business & Sales.description: Leverages LinkedIn's data and AI to help reps find prospects, understand insights, and engage in personalized ways.

Business & Sales.name: Salesforce Einstein
Business & Sales.description: AI layer within Salesforce Sales Cloud that provides predictions, recommendations, and automation.

Business & Sales.name: Seismic
Business & Sales.description: Sales enablement platform that uses AI to help reps find, personalize, and share the most relevant marketing content.

Audio & Music.name: Audino AI
Audio & Music.description: AI-powered audio generation platform that analyzes videos to create perfectly synced sound effects and dynamic background music.

Audio & Music.name: MusicStar.AI
Audio & Music.description: An AI music generator that creates royalty-free music in various genres based on user input, including beats, lyrics, and vocals.

Audio & Music.name: Noiz AI
Audio & Music.description: Design expressive voices that sound human. Let stories write, speak, and mix themselves with intelligent creation.

Audio & Music.name: ACE Studio
Audio & Music.description: AI singing voice generator with a DAW bridge, allowing granular control over vocal melodies and voice model customization.

Audio & Music.name: Amazon Alexa
Audio & Music.description: Voice-controlled virtual assistant for smart home control, music streaming, and online shopping.

Audio & Music.name: Controlla Voice
Audio & Music.description: An ethically-trained browser app that generates AI singing outputs and custom models from a capella vocal stems. It allows blending voices to create hybrid AI vocalists.

Audio & Music.name: ElevenLabs
Audio & Music.description: Leading AI voice generation with text-to-speech and voice cloning

Audio & Music.name: Emvoice
Audio & Music.description: A vocal synthesizer plugin (VST/AU/AAX) with a focus on realism, allowing users to create AI vocals by entering notes and lyrics.

Audio & Music.name: Kits AI
Audio & Music.description: A freemium web app that delivers voice-to-voice audio conversion based on a variety of high-quality royalty-free voice models. It also allows users to train their own AI models.

Audio & Music.name: Murf
Audio & Music.description: AI voiceover tool with drag-and-drop interface and 200+ voices

Audio & Music.name: Revocalize
Audio & Music.description: An AI voice platform for creating studio-quality voices, training custom AI voice models, and discovering talent through an AI marketplace.

Audio & Music.name: Suno
Audio & Music.description: AI music generator for royalty-free tracks from simple prompts

Audio & Music.name: Synthesizer V
Audio & Music.description: A DAW with a built-in, state-of-the-art AI voice generator that allows users to sculpt the melody performed by the AI.

Audio & Music.name: Udio
Audio & Music.description: AI music creation with advanced editing and customization

Audio & Music.name: Vocaloid
Audio & Music.description: Yamaha's AI voice generator for musicians with over 100 voices to choose from and a voice changer feature.

Audio & Music.name: Wondercraft
Audio & Music.description: AI audio platform for creating engaging podcasts in minutes, with the use of AI voices, including your own. Create, translate, and share podcasts at scale.

Education & Learning.name: AskLibrary
Education & Learning.description: AskLibrary is a tool that allows you to add unlimited books to a virtual library and get instant answers from those books through AI-powered insights.
Education & Learning.pricing: Pricing not publicly available, requires sign-up.

Education & Learning.name: Brisk Teaching
Education & Learning.description: A free Chrome extension that uses AI to help teachers create instructional materials, provide feedback, evaluate student writing, adjust reading levels, and generate personalized curriculum. It integrates with Google Classroom, Docs, Slides, YouTube, Canvas, Schoology, and Microsoft tools.
Education & Learning.pricing: Offers a "Free Forever" plan for individual educators. A "Brisk Educator Pro" plan is available for $99.99/year, and custom pricing is available for schools and districts.

Education & Learning.name: Curipod
Education & Learning.description: An AI tool that generates interactive slide decks with polls, word clouds, open-ended questions, and drawing tools based on a given topic.
Education & Learning.pricing: Freemium model with a free plan that includes most features. Premium features are available on a paid plan.

Education & Learning.name: Diffit
Education & Learning.description: An AI tool that allows educators to adapt existing materials or generate new resources for any reading level. It can take a topic, URL, or pasted text and generate leveled reading passages, summaries, vocabulary lists, and more.
Education & Learning.pricing: Offers a free trial and a free version. An individual teacher subscription is $14.99/month, and school-wide licenses are available with custom pricing.

Education & Learning.name: QuestionWell
Education & Learning.description: An AI tool that generates an endless supply of questions from a given text. It can create essential questions, learning objectives, and multiple-choice questions that can be exported to various platforms like Quizlet, Kahoot, and Google Forms.
Education & Learning.pricing: Offers a generous free plan. The premium plan is $5.83/month (billed annually) or $7/month.

Education & Learning.name: Eduaide.ai
Education & Learning.description: An AI-powered platform designed for K-12 educators to create lesson plans, graphic organizers, and educational games, aiming to reduce teacher burnout and save time.
Education & Learning.pricing: Offers a free plan with a monthly generation limit. The 'Pro' plan is available for $5.99 per month, providing unlimited generations and additional features. Custom pricing is available for schools and districts.

Education & Learning.name: Khanmigo
Education & Learning.description: An AI-powered learning tool from Khan Academy that acts as a virtual tutor and debate partner for students. It also assists teachers with lesson planning and other administrative tasks.
Education & Learning.pricing: Free for all U.S. teachers. Also available through a paid subscription at $4 per month or $44 per year.

Education & Learning.name: MagicSchool.ai
Education & Learning.description: An AI platform for schools and districts that provides tools for teachers and students to personalize learning, save time, and improve student outcomes. It includes features like an AI tutor, text rewriter, and rubric generator.
Education & Learning.pricing: Offers a free plan for individual teachers. The 'Plus' plan is $8.33/user/month (billed annually) or $12.99/user/month (billed monthly). Custom pricing is available for schools and districts.

Education & Learning.name: SchoolAI
Education & Learning.description: A trusted AI platform for educators and learners, offering personalized learning experiences, real-time insights for teachers, and tools for creating lesson plans, rubrics, and assessments.
Education & Learning.pricing: Offers a free plan for individual teachers. 'Pro' and 'Scale' plans are available for schools and districts with custom pricing.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Character.ai
Healthcare & Wellness.description: A platform where users can chat with AI characters, including therapists and psychologists, available for free.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: EmoBay
Healthcare & Wellness.description: An AI-powered mental health and wellness platform, described as a 'psychosocial bestie', offering emotional support with daily check-ins and journaling.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Mental: AI Therapy
Healthcare & Wellness.description: An evidence-based AI therapy and self-improvement app available 24/7. It offers real-time, empathetic guidance that adapts to your unique goals and needs.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Mindsera
Healthcare & Wellness.description: An AI-powered journaling app that helps users manage their mental health by providing insights and emotional analytics based on their writing. It also offers guidance from AI personas.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Thrive AI Health
Healthcare & Wellness.description: A personal AI-powered health coach that connects with wearables and health apps to provide personalized wellness plans and advice.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Calm
Healthcare & Wellness.description: A leading meditation and sleep app that now uses generative AI to provide personalized recommendations.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Fitbod
Healthcare & Wellness.description: An AI-powered muscle building app that offers personalized, progressive overload, and recovery-aware workout plans.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: FitnessAI
Healthcare & Wellness.description: An AI-powered workout planner that uses data from millions of workouts to generate personalized training plans for strength and weight loss.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Woebot
Healthcare & Wellness.description: A mental health ally chatbot that helps users deal with symptoms of depression and anxiety. It uses CBT techniques and aims to build a long-term relationship with users. Note: The app has been announced to be shutting down.

Healthcare & Wellness.name: Wysa
Healthcare & Wellness.description: An AI chatbot that provides anonymous support and is trained in cognitive behavioral therapy, mindfulness, and dialectical behavioral therapy. It is clinically validated and offers features for young people.

Finance & Trading.name: AlphaWatch AI
Finance & Trading.description: AI-powered market intelligence for Fortune 500s, investment funds, and pharmaceutical leaders.

Finance & Trading.name: Hebbia
Finance & Trading.description: Institutional-scale financial analysis, diligence, and presentation creation.

Finance & Trading.name: Kensho
Finance & Trading.description: Data-driven forecasting. Owned by S&P Global.

3D & Game Development.name: Contentcore XYZ
3D & Game Development.description: Combines AI 3D model generation with manual editing tools, allowing users to refine AI-generated assets before exporting them.

3D & Game Development.name: Formia
3D & Game Development.description: A browser-based AI 3D model generator that allows users to create simple 3D models quickly using text prompts.

3D & Game Development.name: Morflax
3D & Game Development.description: A browser-based AI 3D model generator that focuses on creating quick assets that you can easily generate in a few clicks.

3D & Game Development.name: Tencent Hunyuan3D
3D & Game Development.description: Specializes in generating realistic 3D models with clean geometry. Particularly effective at producing human characters and smooth-surfaced objects.

3D & Game Development.name: 3D AI Studio
3D & Game Development.description: Focuses on creating detailed 3D content and 3D models from text descriptions and image references. Capable of generating complex objects with high-resolution textures.

3D & Game Development.name: Meshy AI
3D & Game Development.description: Generates 3D models from text and images.

3D & Game Development.name: Rodin by Hyper 3D
3D & Game Development.description: Focuses on producing high-quality AI-generated 3D models and assets with efficient topology, making its models easier to use in game development and interactive applications.

3D & Game Development.name: Tripo
3D & Game Development.description: Designed for accessibility, making AI-powered 3D modeling available to users with little to no prior experience. The tool generates models based on simple and basic prompts and offers basic editing options.

Data & Analytics.name: Akkio
Data & Analytics.description: Generative BI platform for predictive modeling and insight generation.

Data & Analytics.name: PrivacyPal
Data & Analytics.description: A browser extension for AI Governance & Privacy. It uses Privacy Twins—not redaction—to replace sensitive data.

Data & Analytics.name: Strix
Data & Analytics.description: An open-source AI hacking agent that finds real security vulnerabilities, validates them with PoCs, and generates detailed reports.

Data & Analytics.name: Cyera
Data & Analytics.description: A cloud-native data security platform for IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS environments. It offers data visibility, data security posture management, and data access governance.

Data & Analytics.name: Microsoft Power BI
Data & Analytics.description: Industry-standard analytics with generative AI, leveraging Co-Pilot and OpenAI models.

Data & Analytics.name: Normalyze
Data & Analytics.description: An agentless data scanning solution for AI/ML in cloud environments. It offers data discovery and analysis capabilities as well as vulnerability and risk prevention, detection, triaging, and remediation.

Data & Analytics.name: Pyramid
Data & Analytics.description: Conversational data discovery and dashboard building.

Data & Analytics.name: Qlik
Data & Analytics.description: Embeds generative AI analytics into reports and dashboards, with a focus on explainability.

Data & Analytics.name: Sisense AI
Data & Analytics.description: Embeds conversational analytics into BI tools and applications.

Data & Analytics.name: YellowfinBI
Data & Analytics.description: Emphasizes data-driven storytelling and collaborative machine learning analytics.

Other AI Tools.name: Dot by New.computer
Other AI Tools.description: An AI journal that creates a living history of your life.

Security & Privacy.name: Deepengine
Security & Privacy.description: Democratizing cybersecurity for early tech. It helps tech teams spot vulnerabilities before they hit your bottom line, starting at zero cost.

Security & Privacy.name: RiskAssessmentAI
Security & Privacy.description: The AI-powered platform that completes vendor risk & cyber security questionnaires and assessments, based on your internal policies and procedures.

Security & Privacy.name: Granica
Security & Privacy.description: An AI infrastructure platform for building safe, effective, and low-cost traditional and generative AI. It offers real-time sensitive data discovery, classification, and masking.

Security & Privacy.name: Nightfall AI
Security & Privacy.description: An enterprise data leak prevention platform for SaaS, genAI, email, and endpoints. It provides sensitive data discovery, encryption, and exfiltration protection.

Security & Privacy.name: Private AI
Security & Privacy.description: Offers data discovery, masking, anonymization, and replacement for on-premises environments. It uses a proprietary de-identification technology for LLMs.

Security & Privacy.name: Securiti AI
Security & Privacy.description: A comprehensive suite of AI security tools for hybrid and multi-cloud environments. Features include AI security and governance, data privacy automation, and data security posture management.

Security & Privacy.name: TrustArc
Security & Privacy.description: A data privacy management solution focusing on regulatory compliance. It offers consent and consumer rights management, automated data privacy governance, and third-party privacy assessments.
